string-array.name: user_guide_array
string-array.item: Sign-in Activity: Sign-in activity is comprise of: 1). Email Input Field: In this input field, users will fill-in their registered email ID. 2). Send Code Button: Users will have to press this button after filling their email in above input field. 3). Code Input Field: Here users will have to enter the security code sent to their emails by the firebase server. 4). Sign-in Button: Users wants to sign-in to the system will press this button after filling the required credentials in above given fields.

Profile Activity: Signed-in uses will be redirected to the profile activity. This activity is comprise of: 1). User ID: It is a simple text showing the user status. 2). Poll Button: Users will press this button in order to cast vote in the poll. 3). Result Button: Users can view results by pressing this button. 4). Sign-out Button: Users will sign-out through this button.

Poll Activity: Poll activity is the activity where users will cast their votes for candidates. This activity is comprised of: 1). Sliding Tabs: Poll activity contains sliding tabs. Each tab has a list of candidates of the same category. 2). Candidates’ list: Candidates are populated from the database in individual tab. 3). Candidate’ data: Candidate’s includes, name, photo, symbol and a selector for vote casting. 4). Submit Button: User wants to submit the votes will press this button.

Results Activity: The result activity is composed of: 1). Sliding tabs: Tabs containing lists of candidates populated by the firebase server. 2). Candidates’ lists: Each list is comprising of candidates of the same category showing the collective result from the database.
